dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hello, I'm on a quest to save the kingdom from the dragon. What shall we do?

dialogues.speaker: Game Master
dialogues.text: As you enter the dark forest, you notice three paths before you. Which one will you choose?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I'll take the path on the left. What do I see?

dialogues.speaker: Game Master
dialogues.text: You see a clearing with a beautiful castle in the center. But as you approach, a knight blocks your way.

dialogues.speaker: Game Master
dialogues.text: 'Halt, traveler!' the knight exclaims. 'You're not welcome here. Turn back while you still can.'
